scenario_text.value:
Oh, Takuma! Are you almost ready to head for
the shrine?
How should I respond to Miu?
Not even a little.
I’m getting ready now.
Not even a little. You’re all set, then?

Eh heh...
I can’t say I’m finished yet.
Miu’s all talk! Whaddaya gonna do?
...It’d be nice if you guys got the lead out.

You got it! Come on, Shakomon!
Let’s get serious!
Sure! Not that I really believe you...
I’m getting ready now. Are you all finished?
Not even a little! That’s Miu for you.

Hey, if you didn’t keep yapping about this or
that I wouldn’t get so distracted!
Sure, it’s always someone else’s fault!
(Miu and Shakomon are two peas in a pod...)

(The way they fuss at each other only shows
how deep their trust goes.)

Huh? What’s so funny, Takuma? If I didn’t
know better I’d think you’re sneering at us!
Miu’s staring at me with a disquieted gaze!
I’m not smirking!
You guys’re so close.

I’m not smirking! I just thought you two were
acting cute, that’s all!
Hmm, something’s not right...
Yeah, I don’t trust the look in his eyes!
Now hold on! This is just a misunderstanding!

Ahaha, we’re just kidding! C’mon, Shakomon,
we’d better get ready for real!
You guys’re just so close, I can’t help it.

Darn tootin’! Me and Shakomon depend on each
other!

Yeah! I need Miu, and Miu can’t get by
without me!

Takuma? Do you remember when Falcomon left
Minoru that time?
How should I respond to Miu?
Yeah, I remember.
I can’t say I do.

Yeah, I remember. That was a hard time for
everyone.

Yeah... You know, I’ve never felt like
I couldn’t trust Shakomon. Not even once.

For some reason, I felt like Shakomon would
never betray me.

Me, betray Miu?! The thought’s never even
crossed my mind!

Yeah, I get it, Shakomon! I never doubted you
for a second.

(That moment I doubted Agumon...
I still remember it.)

Yeah... To be honest, I’m a little jealous of
you two.

Whaaa’? But the bond between you and Agumon
is super strong, isn’t it?!
Yeah, that’s true, but...

Oh, shoot! I have to finishing getting ready
pretty soon!
Let’s go, Shakomon! Later, Takuma!
I can’t say I remember that time...

You’re kidding! I didn’t think any of us
could forget about the time that happened.

We all lost faith in these little guys, even
though we shared such strong bonds.

...That’s why I don’t really like to think
about it.
Oh...sorry.

Oh, shoot! I have to finishing getting ready
pretty soon!
Let’s go, Shakomon! Later, Takuma...
